update biz_attendance_management
staff_code = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update biz_attendance_management set staff_code = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_code = #{stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, working_day = #{workingDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_staManage_foreman = #{isStamanageForeman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_internship = #{isInternship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, after_intership_working = #{afterIntershipWorking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, peacetime_timeout = #{peacetimeTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, holiday_overtime = #{holidayOvertime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_family_reunion_dinner_on = #{isFamilyReunionDinnerOn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_the_spring_festiva_one = #{onTheSpringFestivaOne,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, on_the_spring_festiva_two = #{onTheSpringFestivaTwo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_departure = #{isDeparture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, casual_leave = #{casualLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, absenteeism = #{absenteeism,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sick_leave = #{sickLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, annual_leave = #{annualLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, marriage_leave = #{marriageLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, maternity_leave = #{maternityLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, funeral_leave = #{funeralLeave,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, days_off = #{daysOff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, verbal_warnings = #{verbalWarnings,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, written_warning = #{writtenWarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, major_accident = #{majorAccident,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_accomodate = #{isAccomodate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_boarder = #{isBoarder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, splendor_card_blue = #{splendorCardBlue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, splendor_card_green = #{splendorCardGreen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, part_time_scale = #{partTimeScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, month_performance = #{monthPerformance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, manager_bonus_scale = #{managerBonusScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_month = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_create_time = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sys_update_time = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biz_attendance_management
station_code = '${stationCode}'
and year_month = '${yearMonth}'
year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT top ${pageSize} *, (select station_name from biz_station where station_code = t2.station_code) station_name, t2.station_code, (SELECT area_name FROM biz_area WHERE area_code = (SELECT area_code FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = tt.station_code)) area_name, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level WHERE station_level_code = (SELECT station_level_code FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = tt.station_code)) station_level_name, t2.staff_code, t2.staff_name, t2.staff_idcard, t2.staff_bankcard, t2.staff_bank, t2.duty_code, (SELECT duty_name FROM biz_duty WHERE duty_code = t2.duty_code) duty_name, t2.staff_in_date FROM biz_attendance_management as tt, biz_staff t2
t2.staff_code = tt.staff_code and t2.station_code = tt.station_code and tt.id not in ( SELECT top ${startIndex} ttt.id FROM biz_attendance_management as ttt, biz_staff t3 where t3.staff_code = ttt.staff_code and t3.station_code = ttt.station_code
and ttt.station_code = '${stationCode}'
and ttt.year_month like '%${yearMonth}%'
order by ttt.year_month, t3.duty_code, ttt.staff_code)
and tt.station_code = '${stationCode}'
and tt.year_month like '${yearMonth}'
order by tt.year_month, t2.duty_code, tt.staff_code

SELECT t3.station_name, (SELECT area_name FROM biz_area WHERE area_code = t3.area_code) area_name, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level WHERE station_level_code = t3.station_level_code) station_level_name, t1.staff_code, t1.staff_name, t1.staff_idcard, t1.staff_bankcard, t1.staff_bank, t1.staff_in_date, (SELECT duty_name FROM biz_duty WHERE duty_code = t1.duty_code) duty_name, t2.id, t2.staff_code, t3.station_code, t2.working_day, t2.is_staManage_foreman, t2.is_internship, t2.after_intership_working, t2.peacetime_timeout, t2.holiday_overtime,t2.is_family_reunion_dinner_on, t2.on_the_spring_festiva_one, t2.on_the_spring_festiva_two, t2.is_departure, t2.casual_leave, t2.absenteeism, t2.sick_leave, t2.annual_leave, t2.marriage_leave, t2.maternity_leave, t2.funeral_leave, t2.days_off, t2.verbal_warnings, t2.written_warning, t2.major_accident, t2.is_accomodate, t2.is_boarder, t2.splendor_card_blue, t2.splendor_card_green, t2.part_time_scale, t2.month_performance, t2.manager_bonus_scale, t2.remark, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time FROM biz_station t3, biz_staff t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_attendance_management t2 ON t1.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}' and t1.station_code = t2.station_code WHERE t1.station_code = t3.station_code and t1.staff_status != '2'
AND t1.station_code = '${stationCode}'
order by t1.duty_code, t1.staff_code
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biz_attendance_management WHERE year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT t2.staff_name, t2.staff_idcard, t2.staff_bankcard, t2.staff_bank, t2.duty_code, t2.staff_in_date, t3.loss_amt, (select station_name from biz_station where station_code = t1.station_code) station_name, (select area_name from biz_area where area_code = t4.area_code) area_name, (select station_level_name from biz_station_level sl, biz_station_target staff where sl.station_level_code = staff.station_level_code and staff.staff_code = t1.staff_code) station_level_name, (select duty_name from biz_duty duty where duty.duty_code = t2.duty_code) duty_name, (select sum(holiday_money) from biz_holiday_cost where year_month = '${yearMonth}' and type = '0') holiday_money, (select sum(holiday_money) from biz_holiday_cost where year_month = '${yearMonth}' and type = '1') subsidy_money, t1.* FROM biz_attendance_management t1, biz_staff t2, biz_station t4, biz_staff_cost t3 WHERE t4.station_code = t1.station_code AND t1.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND t3.staff_code = t1.staff_code AND t3.staff_cost_year_month = '${yearMonth}' AND t1.year_month = '${yearMonth}' AND t4.district_code = '${districtCode}'
ORDER BY t1.station_code ASC

SELECT t2.staff_name, t2.staff_idcard, t2.staff_bankcard, t2.staff_bank, t2.duty_code, t2.staff_in_date, t3.loss_amt, t4.station_name, (select area_name from biz_area where area_code = t4.area_code) area_name, (select station_level_name from biz_station_level sl, biz_station_target staff where sl.station_level_code = staff.station_level_code and staff.staff_code = t1.staff_code) station_level_name, duty.duty_name, duty.duty_nature, (select sum(holiday_money) from biz_holiday_cost where year_month = '${yearMonth}' and type = '0') holiday_money,
(case when lb.loss_bonus_amt is not null then lb.loss_bonus_amt else 0 end) as loss_bonus_amt, (case when lb1.loss_bonus_amt is not null then lb1.loss_bonus_amt else 0 end) as inventory_deduct_amt, (case when t3.staff_cost_acc_fund is not null then t3.staff_cost_acc_fund else 0 end) as staff_cost_acc_fund, (case when t3.staff_cost_endowment is not null then t3.staff_cost_endowment else 0 end) as staff_cost_endowment, (case when t3.staff_cost_unemployment is not null then t3.staff_cost_unemployment else 0 end) as staff_cost_unemployment, (case when t3.staff_cost_medical is not null then t3.staff_cost_medical else 0 end) as staff_cost_medical, (case when mb.phone_cost is not null then mb.phone_cost else 0 end) as phone_cost, (case when mb.education_cost is not null then mb.education_cost else 0 end) as education_cost, (case when mb.job_subsidies is not null then mb.job_subsidies else 0 end) as job_subsidies, (case when st.accommodation_subsidy is not null then st.accommodation_subsidy else 0 end) as accommodation_subsidy, st.is_accommo_subsidy_arti, t1.* FROM biz_attendance_management t1, biz_station t4, biz_duty duty, biz_station_target st, biz_staff t2 LEFT JOIN biz_loss_bonus lb ON lb.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND lb.station_code = t2.station_code AND lb.type = '0' LEFT JOIN biz_loss_bonus lb1 ON lb1.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND lb1.station_code = t2.station_code AND lb1.type = '1' LEFT JOIN biz_staff_cost t3 ON t3.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND t3.station_code = t2.station_code AND t3.staff_cost_year_month = '${yearMonth}' LEFT JOIN biz_manage_base mb ON mb.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND mb.station_code = t2.station_code WHERE t4.station_code = t1.station_code AND t1.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND t1.station_code = t2.station_code AND duty.duty_code = t2.duty_code AND st.station_code = t4.station_code AND st.year_month = '${yearMonth}' AND t1.year_month = '${yearMonth}' AND t4.district_code = '${districtCode}' ORDER BY t1.station_code ASC,duty.sort ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biz_attendance_management WHERE station_code = '${stationCode}' AND year_month = '${yearMonth}' AND status in ('0','1')
